title: Fortnite Treasure Map Guide: Search Between a Covered Bridge, Waterfall, and the 9th Green | Trusted Reviews
description:
![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

As the title suggests, this week sees players searching between a covered
bridge, a waterfall, and the 9th green. But who even needs maps and overly-
vague clues when you can just run straight to the prize?

## **When to Drop**

**Related:[Upcoming PS4 Games](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/upcoming-
ps4-games-3530401)**

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Ideally, you should be looking to jump out with the intention of heading
towards Lazy Links. This should give you enough time to scope out the
surrounding area while making a beeline for the following section…

## **Go Past Lazy Links**

**Related:[Call of Duty Black Ops 4](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/call-
of-duty-black-ops-4-3373836) **

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Sail past Lazy Links on a Northeast bearing. You should aim to try and land at
the back section of the house with the green roof, in the grid section G2.

## **Grab the Star**

**Related:[Battlefield 5](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/call-of-duty-
black-ops-4-3373836) **

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

You should be able to spot a patch of ground with no grass behind the house.
This is where the battle pass will appear. Just waltz up to the area, and when
it pops, hold down the button and that’s the final map hunt of season 5
completed. When you’re done, leg it into the house and loot up just in case
there’s anyone else in the area with the same idea.

Week 9 challenges saw players [follow the treasure map found in Shifty
Shafts](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/fortnite-weekly-challenges-guide-
season-5-3564952), so if you’ve yet to complete that, time is running out. The
same goes for the [latest LTM’s
pickaxe](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/fortnite-weekly-challenges-guide-
season-5-3564952), For any other questions about Fortnite season 5, check out
our [ultimate Fortnite Season 5
hub](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/fortnite-season-5-news-update-skins-
weapons-battle-pass-challenges-3505854).

**And as always, we’re down for chatting Fortnite over on Facebook and Twitter
@trustedreviews.**
